name: Major League Baseball 2K11
description:
The makers of the award-winning NBA 2K11 return to the diamond with MLB®
2K11. Featuring Right Stick hitting and pitching and a revamped fielding
system, MLB 2K11 puts complete control in your hands. Perfect YOUR game
and you’ll dominate the competition.

Features

• Mini-Diamond: An all-new multiplayer mode set in wild venues
•
Home Run Derby: Swing your Wii Remote for the fences
• Franchise:
Build a championship team from the ground up
• Tournament: Pick the
teams and play ball
